com.microblink.metadata

Class MetadataSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microblink.metadata.MetadataSettings

  • public class MetadataSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines which metadata will be available in MetadataListener.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MetadataSettings.ImageMetadataSettings
      Settings specific to which image metadata will be available in MetadataListener

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MetadataSettings() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MetadataSettings.ImageMetadataSettings getImageMetadataSettings()
      Returns the object containing settings defining which images (presented with ImageMetadata) should be available in MetadataListener.
      boolean isDebugMetadataAllowed()
      Returns true if debug metadata (presented as TextMetadata) will be available in MetadataListener.

      Returns true if DetectionMetadata will be available in MetadataListener.

      Returns true if OcrMetadata will be available in MetadataListener.

      Returns true if RecognitionResultMetadata will be available in MetadataListener.

      • MetadataSettings

        public MetadataSettings()

    • Method Detail

      • isDetectionMetadataAllowed

        public boolean isDetectionMetadataAllowed()
        Returns true if DetectionMetadata will be available in MetadataListener. Detection metadatas are all metadata objects from com.microblink.metadata.detection package.
        Returns:
        true if DetectionMetadata will be available in MetadataListener.

      • setDetectionMetadataAllowed

        public void setDetectionMetadataAllowed(boolean detectionMetadataAllowed)
        Sets whether DetectionMetadata should be available in MetadataListener. Detection metadatas are all metadata objects from com.microblink.metadata.detection package.
        Parameters:
        detectionMetadataAllowed - whether DetectionMetadata should be available in MetadataListener.

      • isPartialResultMetadataAllowed

        public boolean isPartialResultMetadataAllowed()
        Returns true if RecognitionResultMetadata will be available in MetadataListener.
        Returns:
        true if RecognitionResultMetadata will be available in MetadataListener.

      • setPartialResultMetadataAllowed

        public void setPartialResultMetadataAllowed(boolean partialResultMetadataAllowed)
        Sets whether RecognitionResultMetadata will be available in MetadataListener.
        Parameters:
        partialResultMetadataAllowed - whether RecognitionResultMetadata will be available in MetadataListener.

      • isDebugMetadataAllowed

        public boolean isDebugMetadataAllowed()
        Returns true if debug metadata (presented as TextMetadata) will be available in MetadataListener.
        Returns:
        true if debug metadata will be available in MetadataListener.

      • setDebugMetadataAllowed

        public void setDebugMetadataAllowed(boolean debugMetadataAllowed)
        Sets whether debug metadata (presented as TextMetadata) should be available in MetadataListener.
        Parameters:
        debugMetadataAllowed - whether debug metadata should be available in MetadataListener.

      • isOcrMetadataAllowed

        public boolean isOcrMetadataAllowed()
        Returns true if OcrMetadata will be available in MetadataListener. Regardless of this, OcrMetadata can only be available if OCR-based recognizer is active.
        Returns:
        true if OcrMetadata will be available in MetadataListener.

      • setOcrMetadataAllowed

        public void setOcrMetadataAllowed(boolean ocrMetadataAllowed)
        Sets whether OcrMetadata should be available in MetadataListener. Regardless of this setting, OcrMetadata can only be available if OCR-based recognizer is active.
        Parameters:
        ocrMetadataAllowed - whether OcrMetadata should be available in MetadataListener.

      • isGlareMetadataAllowed

        public boolean isGlareMetadataAllowed()
        Returns true if GlareMetadata will be available in MetadataListener. GlareMetadata contains information about whether glare was detected in current video frame.
        Returns:
        true if GlareMetadata should be available in MetadataListener, false otherwise.

      • setGlareMetadataAllowed

        public void setGlareMetadataAllowed(boolean glareMetadataAllowed)
        Sets whether GlareMetadata should be available in MetadataListener. GlareMetadata contains information about whether glare was detected in current video frame.
        Parameters:
        glareMetadataAllowed - whether GlareMetadata should be available in MetadataListener.

      • getImageMetadataSettings

        public MetadataSettings.ImageMetadataSettings getImageMetadataSettings()
        Returns the object containing settings defining which images (presented with ImageMetadata) should be available in MetadataListener.
        Returns:
        the object containing settings defining which images (presented with ImageMetadata) should be available in MetadataListener.

      • setImageMetadataSettings

        public void setImageMetadataSettings(MetadataSettings.ImageMetadataSettings imageMetadataSettings)
        Sets object containing settings defining which images should be available in MetadataListener.
        Parameters:
        imageMetadataSettings - object containing settings defining which images should be available in MetadataListener.
